name: Adelynn's Jungle Memory Safari
description: A fun and educational jungle animal memory matching game for children. Help Adelynn discover and learn about jungle animals by matching pairs of animal cards!
author: Bradley Virtual Solutions, LLC

animals.name: Bengal Tiger
animals.fact: Bengal tigers are the largest cats in the world and can weigh up to 500 pounds!

animals.name: African Elephant
animals.fact: African elephants are the largest land mammals and can live up to 70 years!

animals.name: Spider Monkey
animals.fact: Spider monkeys have the longest tails of any primate and use them like a fifth limb!

animals.name: Scarlet Macaw
animals.fact: Scarlet macaws can live up to 50 years and are excellent mimics!

animals.name: Jaguar
animals.fact: Jaguars have the strongest bite of any big cat and can crush turtle shells!

animals.name: Toucan
animals.fact: Toucans use their large beaks to reach fruit on thin branches!

animals.name: Crocodile
animals.fact: Crocodiles have been around for over 200 million years - they're living dinosaurs!

animals.name: Hippopotamus
animals.fact: Hippos can hold their breath for up to 5 minutes underwater!

animals.name: Anaconda
animals.fact: Anacondas are the heaviest snakes in the world and can grow up to 30 feet long!

animals.name: Poison Dart Frog
animals.fact: Poison dart frogs get their poison from the insects they eat in the wild!

animals.name: Morpho Butterfly
animals.fact: Morpho butterflies have iridescent blue wings that shimmer in the sunlight!

animals.name: Sloth
animals.fact: Sloths move so slowly that algae grows on their fur, giving them a green color!
